member.name: M:SketchUpForDynamo.Material.GetTextureUsesAlpha
member.summary: Does the material texture use alpha?

member.name: M:SketchUpForDynamo.SketchUp.ReformatModel(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Reformats an existing SketchUp Model to another Version

member.name: M:SketchUpForDynamo.SketchUp.LoadModel(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Load SketchUp Model by Path. This node will load all SketchUp content into Dynamo. By default it will include meshes. Turn meshes off if you are experiencing performance issues.
member.param: Include Meshes (might be faster to turn it off)

member.name: M:SketchUpForDynamo.SketchUp.LoadModelByLayer(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Load SketchUp Model by Path and Layername. This node loads only contents of the specified layer into Dynamo. By default it will include meshes. Turn meshes off if you are experiencing performance issues.

member.name: M:SketchUpForDynamo.SketchUp.GetInstance(SketchUpNET.Instance)
member.summary: SketchUp Component Instance Data. This node extracts all components from an instance.

member.name: M:SketchUpForDynamo.SketchUp.GetGroup(SketchUpNET.Group)
member.summary: SketchUp Group Data. This node extracts all contents from a group.

member.name: M:SketchUpForDynamo.SketchUp.FlattenInstances(System.Collections.Generic.List{SketchUpNET.Instance})
member.summary: Flatten Instances. This node returns a list of all geometries from a list of instances.

member.name: M:SketchUpForDynamo.SketchUp.WriteModel(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{Autodesk.DesignScript.Geometry.Surface},System.Collections.Generic.List{Autodesk.DesignScript.Geometry.Curve})
member.summary: Write SketchUp Model. This node writes surfaces and cures into a SketchUp model.
